reviews.text: The Grand Mosque is incredible, you have to do it! You can enter inside and visit every day after 4pm. It is completely FREE. The sheer dimensions of this mosque make you shiver. Very beautiful. We were there on a relatively quiet day, so we could truly enjoy the visit. Well organized everything from the registration to the visit itself. Good treatment by the friendly security staff.

Sheikh Zayed grand mosque is one of the best attractions in Abu Dhabi,
I am feeling proud to give some contributions to build few top domes.
Finishing of building is top class. Architecture and marble cutting design awesome.

Cleaning system is very nice. 

You need 2-3 hours to to visit this place. 

Take photos properly this is place photos coming super.

I like to visit this place as much as possible.

I love how they put the designs and architecture. The walls are high and paintings were awesome. Must see! High security as usual so it is very safe for tourist, coz before you can enter directly in the grand mosque you have to go under ground for security check and all. Not allowed to bring food and drinks, dress code is also there, ladies should be fully covered. Otherwise, they can provide the dress. Very serene it is an amazing place!

Beautiful mosque, a must visit if you are going to be in Abu Dhabi. Times vary during the year, there are free tours as well at specific times. We did the tour and you get a closer view of things than on your own so I recommend waiting for the next tour.
There is a dress code for women and men, you can try to wear full coverage clothing and a scarf. But don't worry if you are not quite meeting the requirements, you pass through visitor entry points before going to the mosque and they provide a one piece abaya. 
There is a coffee shop, gift shop, and restrooms as well along the walkway before you reach the mosque entrance.

It was really an experience that was exceptional. It was nice to feel the culture, the tradition, and the solemnity of the place. Registration was smooth even if some of the kiosks ran out of paper. 
Yes, they were strict about the particular poses that a person can do and the clothings allowed, but it is part of the experience which I don't find obtrusive. Great job maintaining the place, preserving the culture and sharing it to the world. Thank God letting me experience it.

Regular Park. Nothing special. Some activities for Kids, but for adults mostly nothing(there is library, museum with aquarium and gym). If you will Come on weekday it is really empty, but overall it is peaceful and nice.

Lovely, family park, with BBQ facilities.
Kids playing area little costly because they r charging separately for all rides etc.
Overall its great to visit this site.

It's just a park. There are a couple of fountains and a library and a lot of space for children to play. Not a place for tourists to visit. Nothing special about it. The price ticket to enter was just 2 dirham!!! Maybe a good place for running
Huge park, they allow various cultural events and get together. You can host birthday party with live buffet. The only problem is washrooms are not well maintained. Excellent place for day out.
Good place to relax, walk, breath, have fun with kids.  Make sure to bring healthy food.

LuLu Island build to be a fun zone... but still not yet ready for big public show....

Waiting for more to come soon...

Lovely, if you want to stay away from the people that insist on throwing trash in public.

Love the island.
Not good family but perfect for youth

Fabulous beaches, exotic blue water, beach activities, and watersports contribute to making Al Lulu Island, one of the most popular Abu Dhabi tourist places. The island stretches from Abu Dhabi Breakwater to the Zayed Sea Port. Explore the magnificent malls, Sheikh Zayed Cricket Stadium and St Joseph Catholic Church.
A small and peacefull place in abudhabi.. Who ever want make thier weekends are better ever
اوكيه
Food is good. But the waiting time is simply unacceptable. You will loose the appetite after waiting for the food
Great taste. Reasonable price. Friendly staff.

Good thing is swift service tasty foods and  privacy.we celebrated a birthday over there on the first floor which was bloocked in prior, it was very spacious and had a good time.Improvement can be done on maintanance of A/c either high or low.
Value for money. Whether it comes to service or quality of food. Good place for a gathering
Just went in for a coffee for myself and lime juice for my family. it was good and the upkeep is neat.
The food is great and affordable. Service was quick. Clean restaurant. Will come back!
Delicious food. Excellent service. Great vibe. Great for families or friends to dine in. The waiter was so kind and thoughtful.
If you like Lebanese food, it's the place to come. Good price/quality ratio. Fast service, not shy of accommodating your individual needs.

It was good experience to have dinner at Liwan Mansour Restaurant.  Food was delicious and service was excellent.
We all liked it.

Al Khalidiyah Dinner : Good Service & Tasty Food

I wanted to eat fattoush salad and hummus with chickpeas so I headed to this Lebanese Restaurant when I passed by and came back. Looks like small space restaurant from the outside so I’d like to check inside first before deciding to have a sit and ask for a menu. But when I came into the entrance, the staffs are so quick and so accommodating guided me up and be seated to a nice spot . I immediately asked for the menu, I believe that if service is good, for sure food taste is good as well, and it is indeed.
